I believe this gives them ownership of there own lives , a sense of pride & accomplishment that is so much more  motivating than a simple hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage all things regarding technology at an entertainment advertising agency. We do DVD packaging, movie posters, advertisements, etc.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: The money does more good for others than sitting in my bank account doing nothing... its the logical choice :)
lenders.occupational_info: I help back up the internet so everytime you search, what you're looking for is there.

lenders.name: Hank

lenders.occupational_info: I make web pages.

lenders.name: Ane and Alberto
lenders.loan_because: We want to support projects wich empower women to independency and substainable living.

lenders.name: Jessica

lenders.name: Nell and Barry
lenders.loan_because: We loan because  this type of support provides a tangible way to assist those trying to improve their quality of life.   Kiva provides us with the opportunity to personally impact the lives of families all over the word.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who helps adults earn their high school diplomas.  My husband is a research scientist.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: We should help whenever possible.
lenders.occupational_info: For the past 35 years I've work in a factory that makes parts for airplanes. I currently work as an inspector.

lenders.name: Min.JAMES

lenders.loan_because: I want to

lenders.name: Cindy

lenders.occupational_info: I teach people skills to help them perform their jobs, and help them plan their careers.

lenders.name: Candice
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up and help to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I give freely of my time to help out organizations and committees at school, church, and in the community.

lenders.name: Uffe Laugesen
lenders.loan_because: I would like to share my wealth with others and I think this way is an easy way.
lenders.occupational_info: Secretary

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries. I want other folks to have the opportunity to run their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I design & build trails for hikers, mountain bikers and other trail users. My passion is digging in the dirt, my reason is to help protect our Mother Earth. Trails can improve health & offer non-consumptive, sustainable economic development for developing nations.

lenders.name: billie
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in people helping themselves which the borrowers do by paying back.
I think uplifting women is the key to a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach women and men to become registered nurses and I work as a nurse in a small hospital.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help set up computer systems that  enable doctors, nurses, and pharmacists to provide better care to their patients.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: It's one of the best ways I've found to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Primarily, I write, edit, design and layout magazines, brochures, newsletters, advertisements, textbooks

lenders.name: Ed & Gigi
lenders.occupational_info: business owner

lenders.name: Sonja & Hans
lenders.loan_because: we want to support and encourage fellowcitizens in other countries
lenders.occupational_info: we worked both on education and research

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: we all have a moral obligation to make the world a better place for all its inhabitants.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because:
I have always wondered how to change the world for the better. 

I immigrated to the United States from a third world country. And I know, the US dollar goes a long way in the 3rd world. My perception of the other side of the world is a little bit more comprehensive than most, since I grew up there.

There is nothing extraordinary about me. I am not a former president , a hollywood celebrity, or a CEO of a big company, but I am a US citizen and a harworking one at that. I realize, that as an indivual, I wield within my hands an economic power that can change the world bit by bit, the US dollar, since I do not have the IQ of Albert Eistein nor the prestige of famous people.  My dollar will speak for me.  I am proud to be one of the lenders. 

Peace through self-sufficiency. 

And thank you to the KIVA TEAM and to all the KIVA LENDERS!! 

May FORTUNE follow in every footsteps you take!! 

Keep on lending!!

lenders.name: Shaanon
lenders.loan_because: I am redistributing the money I make because I have been given so many advantages by being born in the United States.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: Loaning gives me an excellent means of really helping someone.  It is better for the borrowers themselves to repay and it keeps the money working.
lenders.occupational_info: I took early retirment from my business to become the pastor of a struggling congregation.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: If all the people who were financially able to help, would help, even a little bit, this world could be so much better for all of us.  This website is a GREAT start.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business without any funding and understand the difficulty that can be for an entrepreneur.  I believe we need to have faith in other entrepreneurs to break the cycle of poverty because they are such valuable social roll models in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I design all sorts of buildings and industrial equipment along the US east coast

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: It's fun to help people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a school that has a huge Latino population.  I work mainly with the children in the classroom.  I also help families with anything from filling out school forms to finding resources available to them in our community.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: every little bit makes a difference to someone in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I help develop computer systems

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: People willing to work for their dreams deserve a helping hand from friends.
lenders.occupational_info: My business is sculpting and painting animals - dogs, frogs, iguanas and other creatures. For pleasure, I write stories.

lenders.name: Alli Inouye
lenders.loan_because: I work in such a frivolous industry.
lenders.occupational_info: I make things look beautiful so you will want to buy stuff.  Especially when you don't need it.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: While I may not be able to change the world, even one person can impact it positively.
lenders.occupational_info: Corporate blogging software sales

lenders.name: Mark S
lenders.loan_because: It started as a gift from a friend to help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: working for the betterment of public school educators.

lenders.name: JD
lenders.loan_because: it's at the core of humanity and it's proven successful for humans of over eons of time.
lenders.occupational_info: James does computer support at a bank.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because:
"Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest."   
Mark Twain

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: i'm thankful for the privileges i have
lenders.occupational_info: helping companies to use the social web effectively.

lenders.name: Manon et Jean-René
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good for the lender to participate and hopefully for the entrepreneur too. The cooperation in the adventure of entrepreneurship is so important !
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Desjardins (financial coop) to insure that our goals (community développement, éducation/information and financial services for the members ) are respected. All that, by collaborating in different projects with 19 other financial coop (caisses populaires Desjardins) regrouping more than 212,529 members in our region.

lenders.name: Susana
lenders.loan_because:
I can.
All life is equal.  
I have all that I need.
Others should have what they need.
Where there is hunger, there is no freedom/democracy.
I believe in freedom.
Democracy is something we do; it's not something we have.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught first grade for 10 years.  Now I teach English as a second language

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I have a special interest in the people in Africa because my oldest daughter lived there two yrs. during her stay for the peace corp.  I can only wish more people around the world could give of their finicial resourceses in helping these pepole that want more
lenders.occupational_info: Here in the USA I was a computer salesman & before that I was a turkey farmer. So as you see I have had work on both sides of the fence & I understand the value of what it takes to become an owner & worker.The neat part about Kiva is you can add money to your account anytime you wish & you would be helping someone you lend that money to.  For the price you pay for coffee for 1 week can pay for someones new business out there.  Just think of the lives you can reach through Kiva.

lenders.name: Cat Master
lenders.loan_because: I like the statement made "Teach a man to fish...."

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: i believe it passing it around

lenders.name: By & Lin
lenders.loan_because: We can

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It's fun to watch people succeed and grow.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently retired

lenders.name: Robert and Liza

lenders.occupational_info: Teaching children to learn, question, and support the world around them.

lenders.name: Olenka

lenders.occupational_info: I teach art to children.

lenders.name: Harold Dana Sims, Ph.D.

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired now but my working career was spent teaching and writing about Latin American history at the University of Pittsburgh.

lenders.name: Keri
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I CAN !!!  I started my own business when I was 24 and I want to help others start or expand their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner  with my sister.  I operate a breast milk bank.  We collect breast milk from mothers and make it available to sick babies.

lenders.loan_because: I want to make this world a better place for humanity!
lenders.occupational_info: I manufactufacture and distribute stone products to fabricators, builders, developers and interior designers across North America.

Mandala Artist and Intuitive Counselor 
***************
3 question readings available worldwide through e-mail.
***************

lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people reach their dreams

lenders.name: Tresca
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone to do this for me.

lenders.occupational_info: Blending inspiration with motivation to achieve extraordinary results

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like the perpetual nature of the loans, seeing our money actually help someone is great.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Life has been good to me so I want to do my part to help make someone else's life better.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I know my funds are going directly to the people who need it, and I get to see the impact of the money I give.  I also love that these people are empowering themselves to create a business that will help themselves and those around them,
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer in Dallas, TX.  I mostly do wedding photography, but I also shoot sports and portraits.

lenders.name: breck
lenders.loan_because: I like seeing small business thrive without the normal ‘red tape’ that usually strangles it.
lenders.occupational_info: I design systems for 'homeland security' projects, and custom electronic doo dads for companies.

lenders.name: Liz

lenders.occupational_info: I serve God and God's people in the Episcopal Diocese of Chicago.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for my grand kids, and I believe the more people that are self employed and understand capitalism, the more peaceful and prosperous the world will be.
lenders.occupational_info: I grow palm trees for landscape use.

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: it would be cruel not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time student and a part-time teacher.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I was given the opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: Easy compared to how hard people  work across the world to earn a living.

lenders.name: Dangerous Old Woman
lenders.loan_because: To balance in even such a tiny way the inequities that abound in the world.  By U.S. standards I am only one level above 'poor'--but compared to much of the world's population I am wealthy. I hate knowing that so many millions struggle to barely exist and it excites me to help provide opportunities for people who are so willing to work hard if given the chance. It takes so little!

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself...and enable them to improve their situations so they can enjoy life a little more easily.
lenders.occupational_info: I help produce conferences for large companies.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and feel connected to the world.

lenders.name: Jeanine
lenders.loan_because:
There is no better way to help someone than to give them the opportunity to help themselves.  It means a better society for all.
"Teach a man to fish; and he will eat for a lifetime."

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can help hard-working entrepreneurs get the capital the need to finance their worthy projects. They can grow their business and impact on their community. Everybody wins!
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze business needs and design computer software that meets those needs.

lenders.name: Dow Family
lenders.loan_because: To share our good fortune.

lenders.name: Dane
lenders.loan_because: There Is A Need
lenders.occupational_info: Creative

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I now KNOW I can make a difference in someone's life...

lenders.name: donny
lenders.occupation: I own a small construction company

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve food and drinks to people.

lenders.name: Greg & Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I think it helps people get going.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's like planting seeds in a barren field - to see later what has grown there is of great satisfaction. And as our world economy evolves we must all nurture the millions of fields around us.
lenders.occupational_info: My work in the United States is the same as the work through Kiva - except we are much more demanding and conservative requiring all borrowers to have collateral and cash flow and can not lend money on a guess and by golly - but with Kiva we can.

lenders.name: Kyra
lenders.loan_because: This was a Christmas gift to me. I didn't know about Kiva before this. What a great way to pass it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with our future--children.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I study diseases in order to control and prevent them.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because:
I'm blessed!  I want to make an impact in some way (big or small) that will truly help better lives and change the world.  And... human beings should care for and help one another! 
*Imagine all the people
Sharing all the world... 
*Imagine all the people
Living life in peace... 
PEACE & LOVE  ~  Sarah

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a commercial photographer and have been fortunate to run my own business for 26 years. My subjects are diverse and include business executives, families, professional boxing, food and people in all walks of life.  It is the life stories of my subjects that make my job so great. Now, I am happy to hear the stories of my Kiva partners.

lenders.name: Goss/Phylow Family
lenders.loan_because: We are very blessed to have all that we need.  We wanted to help others support themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone to loan me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Hotel

lenders.name: Thomsen Built

lenders.occupational_info: We're entrepreneurs. We love creating, whether it be a home, a community or a new way of doing something. It's fun to take an idea and bring it to life, that's why we love supporting other entrepreneurs in Kiva.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because:
I enjoy seeing how other people's business'
work around the world.

lenders.name: The Wood Family

Nicki: Food writer and radiographer  in Nashville, Tennessee; author of "The London Shopping Companion" and other books.

Tom: Nashville journalist; author of "Karski: How One Man Tried to Stop the Holocaust" and other books.

Eloise: Ninth-grade student at Harpeth Hall School. Someday to be pop star.

lenders.loan_because: I can...

Setting up events for groups.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students. I have also written a history book about women finding their strength and independence in the U.S. West.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: it's a privilege to help women who are working hard to help themselves.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: This is one way I am allowed to live out the Love of Jesus Christ my Lord.  It is a small thing to us, but may enable another to be lifted out of a hole..... I've been there too.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a professional instructor pilot and operate a small flight school in Nampa Idaho.  I teach people to fly aircraft.  When people are fully trained, they come to me to be examined; when they pass the exams, I ussue to them their first Pilot's Certificate for aircraft flight.
I am certified and certificated to work on and repair aircraft as well as fly them.

lenders.name: Fran
lenders.loan_because: I believe that "paying it forward" is the only way to improve the world.  I have been given chances because in America that is what happens.  Entrepreneurs in 3rd World Countries need my help.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I are self-employed and own a laundromat and rental properties.  We have a 17 piece Big Band that works in the Midwest and have performed on several cruise ships.

lenders.name: Mareena
lenders.loan_because: This is such a wonderful idea; helping others to become self sufficient. I may not be able to change the entire world, but I believe that with every small act of kindness we make a difference in the world for the better.

lenders.name: Bernadette & Harry
lenders.loan_because: Our start up money was a gift to me...Now I am leanding to some one who can make a difference in their life .... Makes you feel good to help others
lenders.occupational_info: We work in business that help and services others

lenders.name: Madison
lenders.loan_because: There are many crossroads in our lives. Some jump out and make much noise, and some are barely noticeable. Help us remain true to that path, which is our own. Increase our awareness of the choices we make. All things work together for good as we trust in Your presence as our only guide. We let it be according to Your will.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small decorative wall stencil company where I am the creative director for DuVeau  Stencils. I am a also a LifeStyle Enhancement Specialist.

lenders.name: Del
lenders.loan_because: A small helping hand at the right time for the right opportunity can bring amazing results.
lenders.occupational_info: Discover and model new business initiatives.

lenders.name: Kelly & Alain
lenders.loan_because: It Just feels so gosh darn goooood! Try it, it's kinda addictive. I check out other participants portfolio's and some have from dozens to hundreds of loans. Whenever I see this I am a bit envious. I wish I could afford to do more. My husband and I are going to attempt to do a loan w/ every paycheck, twice a month.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a substitute teacher, and part-time student. I fill in for permanent teachers when they need to take time-off. 
My husband is a design engineer that designs hydraulic valves for a large, international, hydraulic company.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: To show the love that is given by believing in JESUS CHRIST as your savior.

lenders.name: Pat and Bill

lenders.occupational_info: We are a retired couple following our dreams into old age.  Life has been very good to us and we want to pass it along.

lenders.name: Jordan

lenders.name: Leonard
lenders.loan_because: II believe in the entrepreneur sprint and I'm willing to help anyone that is willing to help themselves.  I'm also set a goal for myself to give loans to every Undeveloped and developing countries in the world. Currently, (44) different nations and counting.
lenders.occupational_info: Work for a major brokerage investment company in the tax/cost basis area. I've been in the banking and investment industry for over (20) years.

lenders.name: Steve and Susan
lenders.loan_because: God's been so good to us and we consider it a great honor to be able to glorify Him by giving to others.

lenders.name: thomas
lenders.loan_because: i can...

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help others any way you can, even if the amount you can give is small.

lenders.occupational_info: I design heavy duty foundry production equipment. I take the customer's requirements and design schematics to build there new equipment.

lenders.name: June & Dani

lenders.loan_because: We all can make a difference

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: because I can.  And if you can, why wouldn't you?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm trying to make it as an actor.  Meanwhile working with computers pays the rent.

lenders.name: brandon
lenders.occupational_info: I build new materials in the computer.

lenders.name: Johnathan
lenders.loan_because: I started doing this because everyone needs a helping hand from time to time.  My family is blessed at this time to be able to give to others praying for a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers most of the day.

lenders.name: Ambre
lenders.loan_because: I feel too blessed not to.  The best thing you can do for anyone in this world is give them hope and independence.

lenders.name: Kelly and Sean
lenders.loan_because: We believe the world can be a better place

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: i believe in the power of microeconmics.  But fundementally, I beleive that we are all interdependant on one another and it is in the best interest of all to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee teams that respond to agency and consumer complaints.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: This will change the developing world.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: Giving to others makes me happy!

lenders.name: Ken

Have learned so much about life!
hope to find that one special person to make a difference, from a technical way to a personal way!
lenders.occupational_info:
Very technical, build powerplants and inovate machines.
Looking to help transform someone's life to a higher level with aid of machinery and technology.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Money is like manure - if you spread it around, everything grows.

lenders.name: G Whit
lenders.loan_because: I worked in Africa while in Medical School and thus experienced the daily struggles of the developing world.  I am in a position to help and the collective lending allows others like me to make a major impact in an individual, family, or community's livelihood.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Gastroenterologist or physician that diagnoses and treats illnesses that affect the digestive system.  I also help prevent cancers by removing precancerous growths of the digestive tract.

lenders.name: Debarah
lenders.loan_because:
I was a single Mother for many years and my Mother helped finance several businesses that I owned.  I will never forget her generosity.

I am an entrepreneur at heart and I believe that if I can invest in one small business as a start-up or help grow a business, that my reward is the success of the business owner.

lenders.name: Megan

lenders.name: Elizabeth

lenders.name: Mary K.
lenders.loan_because: I am on a spiritual path that assures me that we are all one. We are not alone. That is the illusion. If I can help another in need, to make their world a better place, I am helping myself as well. The world that I live in will become a better place, with happier, more joyous people. And that is the world I want to live in, so that is the world I choose to help create.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a teacher, in so many ways, all of my life. I believe it is what I am here to do this time around. I taught high school aged children, and then moved to teaching Executive Managers how to deal with the world and the way the world is changing. I also taught battered women and rape victims how to heal, and circles of women how to claim their power.

lenders.name: Peter

lenders.occupational_info: Bicycle Sales, Repair and Nordic Ski Shop, AS well a Specialty coffee shop

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the television news industry.  So, I see hundreds of news stories every day about poverty and the impoverished.

lenders.name: Jean

lenders.name: Linda

lenders.name: Jerome

lenders.occupational_info: I taught students who dropped out of school who came back to further their education (mostly single mothers) so they could get ahead. It was the most rewarding job I ever had.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a healthcare industry as a manager in their technical services.

lenders.name: Acquitaine Capital LLC

lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist working in digital media.

lenders.occupational_info: I visited Central Asia on a mission trip years ago, and I love the people of that region:)

lenders.occupational_info: I make all-natural bath and body products myself; I understand the difficulties involved in having your own business.

lenders.name: Keith-Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We have everything.  Its our responsibility to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: We are in the food and service industry.  Keith is a chef de cuisine with lots on management experience.  Lisa is a self employed entrepreneur having many years of small business management.  We have both travelled a lot and want to show our appreciation of how good others have been to us.  Pass it on!!

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because:
Today, more than ever before, life must be characterized by a sense of Universal responsibility, not only nation to nation and human to human, but also human to other forms of life.

Dalai Lama

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner. I know how difficult it can be at times. I want to help people who may not have had the same advantages i have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I transport Building materials.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.occupational_info: I tune and repair pianos

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I like to see others succed in business.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in need.

lenders.name: Alec
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in need

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed to have enough. But so many of the people that live in my community forget that they have enough, because they are focused on what they don't have, and what they think they need to be happy. Sometimes I forget too. This is a wonderful opportunity for me to remember, and to share what I can, instead of spending it on something that I don't need, so others may feel blessed too. 

I love the idea of Kiva because it mirrors what the organization I work for accomplishes in our community, which is creating a cooperative of financial success.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for a credit union, which is a not-for-profit bank. The credit union philosophy is "People Helping People," so our business is not about making a profit, but about guiding people to make good choices with their money. I work with businesses and the local University to help consumers join the Credit Union as members. A big part of my job is educating the community about consumer and financial issues, and I often work with college students to teach them about managing their finances and understanding how credit works in America.

I also sing in a band and teach voice lessons.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people to lift themselves up when given the right resources and support from their community.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am very supportive of people who have the initiative, courage and strength to take care of themselves and their families in challenging economic environments.
lenders.occupational_info: Work is challenging here, though in different ways, of course.  I typically work 60+ hours per week in a high stress sector, but I love what I do and the people I work with are like a second family.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: humans help one another.

lenders.name: Geraldo
lenders.loan_because: I support creative people.
lenders.occupational_info: I make pictures that help to explain complicated things or ideas. I am self-employed - My spouse and I have our own company.

lenders.name: Elizabeth

I want to help save our planet one corner, and one person at a time.
I want people to breathe a little bit easier because i am here, and i am ready and willing to help you out.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a creative person, who enjoys having fun and being around people and helping save our planet.
I would really like to become a writer, and travel, and do everything i can to help other people and make their lives a little bit easier.

lenders.occupational_info: Install and repair automatic monitoring equipment to gage stream flow , water quality, rainfall, temperature and wind. I'm an independent contractor with my own small business.

lenders.occupational_info: I have written more than 50 books mostly for children and youth but some also for adults. A couple of them are of children in foreign countries to strengthen understanding among us.

painting with oil paints. I also teach people to write poetry who think they can't . Then they see that they can.

This seems like a reliable and trackable way to help by lending and then do it all over again.
